title: WE NEED WEB TRANSLATION TOOL!
content: I can't use a lot web translation extension when I live in China.Because these translation programs are all based on Google translate.But I can't use Google translate in China,I hope FireFox will have translation tool just like edge.
creator: fengjuntao3471

title: Firefox carga lento o no carga paginas
content: Buenas noches, por favor, el FF no está cargando las páginas, se demora, y tras varios intentos se logra, pero muy entrecortado, qué ocurre, alguien sabe, o cómo me regreso a la actualización anterior que funcionaba bien, lo uso en Xubuntu, versión de FF 105.0 (64-bit).
creator: JoseGabriel

title: Book Mark Toolbar
content: All my bookmarks dissapeared in firefox. Got them back by following suggestions from community. Now they all go to the same site. How do I fix this please?
creator: rrponly

title: email received "New sign-in to Firefox"
content:
My wife and I both received an email from accounts@firefox.com with the subject line "New sign-in to Firefox". Each of our emails has a different IP address listed, different locations, same day but different times. I'm assuming is phishing but can anyone confirm?

Thanks. -JG
creator: jdgrif

title: importing passwords firefox 105.0.1
content:
Hello, 

 I was having problems with one of my passwords not updating correctly in firefox 105.0.1   I exported all of the passwords into a csv file and then followed the steps outlined here in the forum to turn on import passwords from a file.  Then while trying to fix the password problem I removed all passwords/ids.  I clicked on the import from a file, selected the file I exported to but nothing happens.. No passwords, no id's. I thought maybe I wouldn't see it in the about:logins screen, so  I tested out three different sites from the export file and no luck on anything.  I was expecting a box to pop up telling me the import was successful or if I was sure I wanted to import all of these passwords but nothing, so even though I get the drop down to import I can't.  Has anyone experienced this problem before or any solutions.

Thanks in advance
creator: mlorkowski
